page.title: 07LOCAL FARMS IN DUNSFORD
page.content: Most farms here are small mixed farms run by the owner/tenant with family help.The day starts early and finishes late but,depending on the season there may be spare time during the day. {Farmer's Normal Day During Harvest.} 7.00 Gets up 7.15 Feeds animals 7.25 Helps wife feed poultry. 7.40 Walks fields to check bullocks. 8.00 Comes in for breakfast 8.30 Moves sheep to another field. 8.40 Checks all animals 9.00 Starts to bail straw.11.15 Coffee break 11.30 Cntinues to bail straw 1.00 Dinner 1.15 Nap 1.30 Brings bails from field to barn. 3.30 Feeds animals 4.00 Moves sheep into field then brings in more bails 5.00 Tea 5.30 Brings in more bails 9.00 Supper 10.00 Bed.
